docs.abstract: Dawn Gugliaro is in her eighth year as the coach of St Francis of Brooklyn’s bowling team; she leads one of a growing number of NCAA women’s bowling programs; sixty NCAA universities sponsored varsity bowling teams last season, up from 42 in 2003, the first year bowling was a championship sport.

headline.main: Collegiate Women’s Bowling Gains in Popularity

docs.abstract: A O Scott looks back on life of actor Philip Seymour Hoffman, who died at age 46; reflects Hoffman, who was perhaps the best actor of his time, specialized in flawed, even detestable characters, and in making audiences care about them.

docs.lead_paragraph: Philip Seymour Hoffman had many irons in the fire at the time of his death, most of them projects and roles that fans will never get to see.
docs.abstract: Actor Philip Seymour Hoffman had many movie, theater and television projects underway before his death, including planned performances with his Off Broadway troupe Labyrinth Theater Company, that his fans will never get to see.

headline.main: Hollywood Was Just One of His Stages
